languages.text: Все тем же ровным, не выражающим эмоций голосом связист завершает отчет — путь к мостику занял шестнадцать часов и сорок одну минуту. Бойцы измотаны и хотели бы отдохнуть некоторое время. В смятении Вигдис замечает, что за пределами "Плача королевы" прошло не более получаса.

traits.locale_text: Все тем же ровным, не выражающим эмоций голосом связист завершает отчет — путь к мостику занял шестнадцать часов и сорок одну минуту. Бойцы измотаны и хотели бы отдохнуть некоторое время. В смятении Вигдис замечает, что за пределами "Плача королевы" прошло не более получаса.

languages.text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.
languages.original_text: Все тем же ровным, не выражающим эмоций голосом связист завершает отчет — путь к мостику занял шестнадцать часов и сорок одну минуту. Бойцы измотаны и хотели бы отдохнуть некоторое время. В смятении Вигдис замечает, что за пределами "Плача королевы" прошло не более получаса.

traits.locale_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

languages.text: 操作员以毫无感情的平淡声音结束了他的报告，说通往舰桥的路程花了16小时41分钟。士兵们都累了，想休息一会儿。维格迪斯很困惑，她注意到，女王挽歌号之外的时间只经过了半个小时。
languages.original_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

traits.locale_text: 操作员以毫无感情的平淡声音结束了他的报告，说通往舰桥的路程花了16小时41分钟。士兵们都累了，想休息一会儿。维格迪斯很困惑，她注意到，女王挽歌号之外的时间只经过了半个小时。

languages.text: 感情を排したいつもの平坦な声で、オペレーターは報告を終えた。ブリッジまで16時間41分かかった。兵士たちは疲れ切っており、身体をとにかく休ませたがっていると。混乱したヴィグディスは、女王の挽歌号の外では、たったの30分しか経過していないことに気づく。
languages.original_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

traits.locale_text: 感情を排したいつもの平坦な声で、オペレーターは報告を終えた。ブリッジまで16時間40分かかった。兵士たちは疲れ切っており、身体をとにかく休ませたがっていると。混乱したヴィグディスは、女王の挽歌号の外では、たったの30分しか経過していないことに気づく。

languages.text: Con su habitual voz plana y sin emociones, el operador completa su informe: el camino hasta el puente ha durado dieciséis horas y cuarenta y un minutos. Los soldados están agotados y desean descansar un poco. Confusa, Vigdis observa que solo ha transcurrido media hora fuera del Lamento de la Reina.
languages.original_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

traits.locale_text: Con su habitual voz plana y sin emociones, el operador completa su informe: el camino hasta el puente ha durado dieciséis horas y cuarenta y un minutos. Los soldados están agotados y desean descansar un poco. Confusa, Vigdis observa que solo ha transcurrido media hora fuera del Lamento de la Reina.

languages.text: In seinem üblichen sachlichen, emotionslosen Ton beendet der Offizier seinen Bericht — der Weg zur Brücke hat sechzehn Stunden und einundvierzig Minuten gedauert. Die Soldaten sind erschöpft und würden sich gerne ein wenig ausruhen. Verwirrt merkt Vigdis an, dass nur eine halbe Stunde außerhalb der Klage der Königin vergangen ist.
languages.original_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

traits.locale_text: In seinem üblichen sachlichen, emotionslosen Ton beendet der Offizier seinen Bericht — der Weg zur Brücke hat sechzehn Stunden und einundvierzig Minuten gedauert. Die Soldaten sind erschöpft und würden sich gerne ein wenig ausruhen. Verwirrt merkt Vigdis an, dass nur eine halbe Stunde außerhalb der Klage der Königin vergangen ist.

languages.text: De sa voix monocorde habituelle, entièrement dénuée d'émotions, l'opérateur achève son rapport : au bout de seize heures et quarante et une minutes d'exploration, les éclaireurs ont fini par atteindre la passerelle. Ils sont épuisés et demandent l'autorisation de se reposer un moment. Perplexe, Vigdis songe qu'à l'extérieur de la Complainte de la Reine, il ne s'est écoulé qu'une demi-heure à peine.
languages.original_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.

traits.locale_text: De sa voix monocorde habituelle, entièrement dénuée d'émotions, l'opérateur achève son rapport : au bout de seize heures et quarante et une minutes d'exploration, les éclaireurs ont fini par atteindre la passerelle. Ils sont épuisés et demandent l'autorisation de se reposer un moment. Perplexe, Vigdis songe qu'à l'extérieur de la Complainte de la Reine, il ne s'est écoulé qu'une demi-heure à peine.

languages.text: Operatör; her zamanki duygusuz, tekdüze sesiyle raporunu tamamlıyor: Köprüye ulaşmak, on altı saat kırk bir dakika sürüyor. Askerler bitkin ve biraz dinlenmek istiyorlar. Şaşkın bir şekilde Vigdis, Kraliçenin Matemi'nin dışında sadece yarım saatin geçtiğini belirtiyor.
languages.original_text: In his usual flat voice devoid of emotion, the operator completes his report — the way to the bridge took sixteen hours and forty-one minutes. The soldiers are exhausted and would like to rest for some time. Confused, Vigdis notes that only half an hour has passed outside the Queen's Lament.
